intro: A haunting tale of sin and redemption, bound by a twisted fate. Can three individuals uncover the tragic past hidden beneath the crimson-stained snow?
description:
"Scarlet Snowfall" is the fourth installment in Child-Dream's popular ADV game series. 
This suspenseful visual novel, with a touch of horror, depicts the confrontation between three men and women trapped in a snowy mountain and an unknown presence lurking in the snow-dark.
 A man barricaded in a mountain cabin, a strange old man, a beautiful yet eerie snow woman...What is the 'truth of Hino Mountain' uncovered after facing various abnormalities and dire situations?

【System】
- Uncover the mystery with the “zapping system.”
- Switch between two protagonists, capture key moments, and replay scenes to discover hidden clues.

- Even after a failed attempt, restart instantly with helpful hints.
- The user-friendly interface makes this game accessible to everyone, ensuring a satisfying gaming experience.

【Story】
[Shun's Part]
Shun awakens inside a snow cave. Why is he trapped on this snowy mountain? Haunted by visions of the "fire ritual" he saw in a dream, he suffers in anguish. Suddenly sensing a presence, Shun looks up and sees something terrifying. Trembling in fear, what awaits him after his scream?

[Mayu's Part]
Writer Mayu Katsuragi and her friend Kasumi were aiming to reach the summit of Mt. Hino. Struck by a sudden blizzard and nearly on the verge of being stranded, the two discover a secluded "mountain guardian's house." Despite an ominous feeling, they step inside...
